channel.title: net on Zikey Vi
channel.description: Recent content in net on Zikey Vi

item.title: Fuck the Great Fire Wall
item.description: 当我老了，回顾一生，就会发觉，我三分之一的生命，都浪费在和GFW作斗争上了。 呜呼！多么宏伟啊！千年前的巨石，砌就秦帝国的坚不可摧；今日那日夜呼啸的服务器集群，彰显共和国非凡的制度自信。 Top-level solution selection In terms of the ways I have tried myself: Use a VPN application Rent an overseas server Subscribe to an airport service The last option strikes the best balance between price and convenience. As for the first two option: Beware of phishing High cost in time or money Stability is a concern
